(I'll be putting Sun Crusher in with my large huge post from now on.)

Sun Crusher:


"Those are our enemies," Sun Crusher said to the new Brotherhood recruit Baal 
and pointed out each individual enemy of the Brotherhood, NDE, and others 
quickly, "exterminate the heathens." he blasted off immediately after that, 
heading for a certain Warrior of Light.
